snippet: Trisha Brown Dance Company presented what were announced to be her last works, and Pam Tanowitz bounced back from the misstep of “Untitled (Blue Ballet).”
abstract: Year in dance is seen as time for farewells and comebacks; 2013 is year Trisha Brown Dance Company presented what were announced to be her final works, and Pam Tanowitz bounced back from the misstep of Untitled (Blue Ballet) with The Spectators, presented at New York Live Arts.
lead_paragraph: Trisha Brown Dance Company presented what were announced to be her last works, and Pam Tanowitz bounced back from the misstep of “Untitled (Blue Ballet).”

headline.seo: Brian Seibert on the Dance Highlights of 2013
headline.main: A Time for Farewells and Comebacks
headline.print_headline: A Time for Farewells And Comebacks
